The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the countless empires that make up the Galaxy beyond. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an homage to both "Miami Vice" and has some elements that pay homage to "Honey I Shrunk the Kids", which was released a few months prior.
Featuring cameos from biggest stars of the 80's such as Martin Landau, Heidi Von Beltz
